Specs as follows:

Core 2 2.4ghz
2 gb RAM
GF7950GX2
XF-i s/c
Asus p5wdh

Video/Sound card drivers all up to date, and i have tried both the 1.3 and 1.4.1 beta patch, but still are sowing the same result.
I suspect its vista thats causing the corruption. Uploaded 2 pics below

post.author: LDAsh
post.body:
Can't view the pics so not sure the exact problem, but here are the cvars that control texture quality:-
Code:
seta image_downSize "0"
seta image_downSizeBump "0"
seta image_downSizeSpecular "0"
seta image_filter "GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR"
seta image_ignoreHighQuality "0"
seta image_roundDown "0"
seta image_useCompression "0"
seta image_useNormalCompression "0"
seta r_renderer "best"
You can put those in the console or your CFGs to override the in-game menu settings.
